RECORD.TEXT: 884948991 PUOMC 6857671 91825/q468 156535 5/23/1995 12:00:00 AM RENAL CELL CARCINOMA . Unsigned DIS Report Status : ADMISSION DATE : 5/23/95 DISCHARGE DATE : 5/30/95 PRINCIPAL DIAGNOSIS : Renal cell carcinoma . ASSOCIATED DIAGNOSIS : Hypertension . Right radical nephrectomy on 5/23/95 . MEDICATIONS ON DISCHARGE : Percocet . HISTORY OF PRESENT ILLNESS : This 60 year old female presents with a mass in her right kidney and she was admitted a Same Day admit for right radical nephrectomy . Postoperatively , she had a rather prolonged episode of ileus . She also had some respiratory problems requiring formal chest physical therapy and otherwise did quite well . Her postoperative creatinine was 0.8 . Preoperative evaluation revealed bone scan with no evidence of metastatic disease . Electrocardiogram showed sinus bradycardia . She will be follow up as an outpatient after her discharge . NAMAIREGID SHUFF , M.D. TR : pq / bmot 6/5/95 TD : CC : Dr. The Vein
